message.content:
Subject: My Decision to Leave the Company

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to take a moment to personally inform you of a decision I have made regarding my future with the company.

After much thought and consideration, I have decided to leave my position at [Company Name] in order to pursue new opportunities and challenges that will help me grow both professionally and personally. This was not an easy decision for me, but I believe it is the right step forward in my career.

I would like to express my gratitude for the support and guidance you have provided during my time here at [Company Name]. Your mentorship has been invaluable, and I am grateful for the opportunities you've given me. I have learned a great deal from working with you, and I will carry those experiences with me as I move forward.

As we move through the transition process, I would like to work closely with you to ensure that my departure goes smoothly and that my responsibilities are effectively covered by other team members. Please let me know when you would be available to discuss this further so that we can plan our next steps together.

Again, thank you for everything you have done for me during my time at [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future, and I am confident that it will achieve great things under your leadership.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
